long_description: The prAna Abby jacket is made from a durable, breathable woven fabric blend that repels spring showers, resists wrinkling and packs easily. It adds light warmth and wind resistance when it's chilly. Added Durable Water Repellent finish allows water to bead up and roll off, keeping you dry in light showers. Contrast interior lining adds visual interest, some weather protection and comfort. 2 zippered front pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The prAna Abby jacket is made from a durable, breathable woven fabric blend that repels spring showers, resists wrinkling and packs easily. It adds light warmth and wind resistance when it's chilly.
